item.title: Possessor Buff and Sorcerer sidegrade
item.dc:creator: Sam17z
item.description:
Hmm… so let’s tackle one at a time.

Sorcerer:

Definitely an over power buff in that if sorc thinks it’s good king then hh + Kill king and even with the protection of king guard the king dies. That is supremely over powered to insta kill a good king. Also the same thing with hunter, hunter bear wouldn’t kill sorc with hh which makes the bear useless. So this seems like an overpowered buff.

Possessor:

I actually thing this is a nerf in a way. Bear with me. Logically, people are going to puppet strings king from now on. Additionally, king can’t visit, so if observer follows king and king visits then… possessor visited king.

Also king doesn’t visit so making king visit seems pretty ridiculous. And late game poss will use king Which basically means it’s a guaranteed attack onto its target.
